entries.title: Tesla promises Cybertruck production is on track, teases next-gen platform
entries.description: The electric car maker also acknowledged its recent steep price cuts, noting that "improving affordability is necessary to become a multi-million vehicle producer."

entries.title: How to sign up for Amazon RxPass
entries.description: Not having to check for prices and deductibles when prescribed a medication is sure to bring relief to many Americans.

entries.title: How to use Security Keys to protect your Apple ID on your iPhone
entries.description: Security Keys can help to create an extra line of defense for your Apple ID to keep hackers away.

entries.title: How to change your Apple Watch face
entries.description: One of the best things about the Apple Watch is the customizability of its face. Here's how to completely change the look and functionality of your Apple Watch with just a few taps.

entries.title: Too many Google Chrome tabs open? Here's how to take back control
entries.description: Stop apologizing for how many tabs you have open and start making those tabs work better for you.

entries.title: How to add fields to a LibreOffice document
entries.description: If you're looking for a new office suite, LibreOffice is an outstanding choice with plenty of options, including the ability to add fields to documents. Find out why this is an important function and how to use it.

entries.title: 7 fixes for missing Slack notifications on MacOS
entries.description: We explore the reasons Slack might not notify you, and how you can fix it. If that's what you really want to do…

entries.title: How to easily and quickly clean your system and free disk space with BleachBit
entries.description: When your computer slowly fills with files, it can become sluggish and problematic. One easy way to take care of this is with the BleachBit tool.

entries.title: How to become an astronaut: What you need to make it into space
entries.description: If you dream of becoming an astronaut, or are just fascinated by the job, here is a look at how you can get there, and the extraordinary experiences you can expect.

entries.title: Microsoft CEO Nadella: 'Expect us to incorporate AI in every layer of the stack'
entries.description: During Microsoft's fiscal first-quarter conference call, Tuesday, CEO Satya Nadella told Wall Street the company's private deal with OpenAI will pervade Microsoft's cloud computing operations. It's so big, he said, it's going to "transform" the company's Azure business.

entries.title: Memory safe programming languages are on the rise. Here's how developers should respond
entries.description: Report puts forward ways that memory safe coding should be encouraged. But there's still a lot of other code out there.

entries.title: Apple just patched this 'actively exploited' flaw in older iPhones and iPads
entries.description: Apple patches iPhone 5 and iPhone 6 for the second time in six months to address remotely exploitable flaw.

entries.title: Lenovo's $499 sale on a 31-inch ThinkVision monitor shouldn't be missed
entries.description: You can save 51% off the standard price of this crisp, professional monitor.

entries.title: Microsoft says services have recovered after major outage that affected Teams and Outlook users
entries.description: Updated: Microsoft says 'impacted services' have recovered and remain stable.

entries.title: Australian man given two-year jail sentence for $69K phishing scams
entries.description: Sydney Local Court dishes out a jail term totalling 32 months to a man who stole more than AU$100,000 ($69,751) in an SMS phishing scam involving 450 victims.

entries.title: AWS launches Melbourne region, plans $4.5B investment
entries.description: Amazon Web Services adds a second infrastructure region and is setting aside $4.5 billion in investments, through to 2037, with plans to build data centres and create jobs in Australia.

entries.title: Save $100 on on this Samsung all-in-one soundbar
entries.description: Short on space? You can still get top-notch audio while saving on space and cash.

entries.title: The perfect flowers: A Lego bouquet on Valentine's Day
entries.description: Skip the long lines and the allergies that arise with live flowers this holiday. This year, gift this gorgeous, pet-friendly bouquet that will truly last forever.

entries.title: These Lego flowers make a perfect Valentine's Day bouquet (seriously, it'll last forever)
entries.description: Skip the long lines and the allergies that arise with live flowers this holiday. This year, gift this gorgeous, pet-friendly bouquet that will truly be forever-lasting.

entries.title: LG C2 deal: Save $1,300 on the 83-inch OLED at Best Buy
entries.description: This monster of an OLED TV is a bit more affordable right now at Best Buy, making it an excellent choice for upgrading your home theater or living room ahead of the Super Bowl.

entries.title: Save $1300 on the 83-inch LG C2 OLED at Best Buy
entries.description: This monster of an OLED TV is a bit more affordable right now at Best Buy, making it an excellent choice for upgrading your home theater or living room ahead of the Super Bowl.
